column4: can anybody help me? How can I unflag a windows damaged partition?
u have to run ntfsfix on it
sorry for my english: use ntfsfix /dev/sda? (your partition dev) to fi it
just fix it or restart windows eit cleanly and then restart the live
and note down then /dev/sda?of the pertition u want
sudo mount -t ntfs-3g /dev/sda? /media/win   (/dev/sda? is the actual sda with the right number)
partition have to be unmounted to be resized
going to bed it 5 am here
